files.template:
import { z } from 'zod';
export async function POST({ request }){ const schema = z.object({ name: z.string() }); const b = await request.json(); const r = schema.safeParse(b); if(!r.success) return new Response('bad',{status:400}); return Response.json({ ok: true }); }
